title: Woman Genie
description: A supernatural female being, which is generally shown to be imprisoned within a bottle or lamp. May be capable of granting wishes when summoned.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the 'woman genie' emoji embodies a mystical and powerful presence. She is depicted with flowing, ethereal robes that utilize Apple's signature smooth gradients and soft rounded edges, giving her a sense of otherworldly grace. Her form is enhanced by subtle 3D shading and realistic lighting, creating an aura of magic and wonder. This emoji, with her enrapturing gaze, is perfect for conveying wishes, dreams, or a touch of enchantment in your digital communications on Apple devices.
